review: Inspra (eplerenone):I was prescribed Inspra when valsartan caused very low BP. I was also taking low dose Beta-Blockers. Unfortunately Inspra had the same effect.It would help if these drugs were available in combined forms, starting at very low doses in order to minimize non-compliance amongst patients who experience troubling side effects.Inspra did not have any noticeable symptomatic benefits but the low BP was very unacceptable.
On this eplerenone tablet for over a year I have side effect symptoms of severe cough, throat swelling,  muscle pain, chest pain, very bad fatigue  and flu like symptoms.
